item.title: Tekken 8 sales top three million; DLC character Anna Williams announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/tekken-8-sales-top-three-million-dlc-character-anna-williams-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

The Scarlet Lightning returns.

Bandai Namco has announced Tekken 8 downloadable content character Anna Williams, who will launch on March 31 for Character Year 2 Pass owners and April 3 for all users. Sales of the game have also now surpassed three million units.

Tekken 8 was last reported in February 2024 to have sold two million units. According to Bandai Namco, the three million sales milestone was achieved at a faster pace than predecessor Tekken 7, which has sold over 12 million copies to date.

Following the release of Anna, the following additional downloadable content is planned via the “Season 2 Character & Stage Pass”:

  • Summer 2025 – New Stage and Character
  • Fall 2025 – New Character
  • Winter 2025 / 2026 – New Stage and Character

Tekken 8 launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on January 26, 2024.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Anna Williams Gameplay Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Merchant 64 launches March 31
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/merchant-64-launches-march-31

  • PC

Low-poly 3D "teeny tiny adventure" game dated.

Low-poly 3D “teeny tiny adventure” game Merchant 64 will launch for PC via Steam on March 31, developer SuitNtie announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Merchant 64 a low-poly tiny retro-inspired traveling merchant game! Take control of Merchant as you buy goods at low prices and sell them in different towns at higher prices.

Key Features

  • A Cozy Tiny Adventure – This is a very small game that is designed to be a wonderful short adventure with multiple endings.
  • Make the Big Bucks – In this adventure take control of Merchant as you buy goods at low prices and sell them in different towns at higher prices.
  • Traverse Across Towns – As a traveling merchant you will need you will need explore the world and travel to new towns where you can sell your goods.
  • Purchase Upgrades – Through your adventure, purchase various upgrades to help out on your merchant journey!

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

item.title: despelote launches May 1
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/despelote-launches-may-1

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

First-person slice-of-life soccer adventure game dated.

First-person slice-of-life soccer adventure game despelote will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on May 1, publisher Panic and developers Julian Cordero and Sebastian Valbuena announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Panic:

About

despelote is a soccer game about people. Get immersed in the streets and parks of Quito through the eyes and ears of eight year old Julián. Dribble, pass and shoot your soccer ball around town, and see what happens when you kick it someone’s way. Feel the city change as Ecuador comes closer than ever to qualifying for the World Cup.

Key Features

  • A bittersweet and sometimes dreamy semi-autobiographical tale of youth.
  • Explore a dense town space at your leisure, full of activities, interactions, and mischief to get up to.
  • A physics-based soccer ball that feels good to kick around in a first-person perspective.
  • A vibrant world full of characters that have funny, and genuine conversations.
  • Photos and audio recorded on location in Ecuador are used to create a strong sense of place.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

item.title: Dauntless to end service on May 30
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/dauntless-to-end-service-on-may-30

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

No additional content or updates planned.

Free-to-play monster hunting game Dauntless will end service on May 29 at 11:45 p.m. PT / May 30 at 2:45 a.m. ET, after which it will no longer be available to play, developer Phoneix Labs announced.

Dauntless first launched for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC on September 26, 2019, followed by Switch on December 10, 2019, and PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on December 2, 2021.

A major update, “Umbral Reign,” was planned for release on January 16, but was delayed to an unannounced date. However, Phoenix Labs announced today that Dauntless will receive no additional content or updates.
